sentences.en: Blowing your nose too hard can cause earache.
sentences.cn: 擤鼻涕太用力会造成耳痛。

sentences.en: Doctor: Does the earache occur deep inside or just at the orifice of your ear?
sentences.cn: 医生: 耳痛是在耳朵深处还是在耳朵口上?

sentences.en: George has an earache. So he must see a doctor.
sentences.cn: 乔治耳朵疼, 因此他必须看医生.

sentences.en: I have got a severe earache.
sentences.cn: 我的耳朵疼得非常厉害.

sentences.en: I've had an earache for the past few days.
I’ve got terrible earache and a sore throat.
sentences.cn: 我耳朵疼得厉害，喉咙也痛。

sentences.en: The disease can also cause a build up of pressure in the inner ear leading to severe earache.
sentences.cn: 该疾病还会引起内耳的压力增加，从而导致剧烈的耳痛。

sentences.en: The patient is complaining of acute earache.
You can relieve earache by chewing gum or candy.
sentences.cn: 嚼块口香糖或糖果就会好些.
